name: Ramadhe Putra
title: Engineer Junior Specialist Paint Shop
company: PT. Hyundai Motor Manufacturing Indonesia · Kontrak
about:
Hello, I am Ramadhe, Bachelor Degree of the Mechanical Engineering study program at Brawijaya University. 
Apart from studying, I actively participate in internship program at PT Ketahanan Aspal Nasional to gain experience in professional field, especially Mechanical Engineering.
I also actively participate joining English debate since I was in Senior High School student until present. Recently, I assist Senior High School and University student for preparing English Debate Competition

I started to join English Debate when I was in Senior High School. I experienced in ton of English Debate Competitions and here are some my achievements:
- Indonesia Representative for WUDC Thailand 2019
- 2nd Runner Up of Asian English Olympic AEO 2019
- 2nd Best Speaker of Asian English Olympic AEO 2019
- East Java Representative for NUDC 2019
